subject: fix: merge OneSignal into sw.js to fix PWA install prompt on Chrome
body:
Chrome showed "Add to Home screen" instead of "Install app" because
beforeinstallprompt never fired. Root cause: OneSignal SDK registered
OneSignalSDKWorker.js at scope /, replacing sw.js as the active service
worker. Since OneSignalSDKWorker.js has no fetch handler, Chrome didn't
consider the site an installable PWA.

Fix: import OneSignal SDK directly into sw.js via importScripts() and
configure OneSignal init() with serviceWorkerPath: '/sw.js' so it uses
our SW instead of registering its own. Removed duplicate push handlers
from sw.js (OneSignal SDK handles those). Bumped cache version to v7.

title: merge OneSignal into sw.js to fix PWA install prompt on Chrome
